channel.title: 🏢 LMU Munich on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 LMU Munich on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Quantifying Aleatoric Uncertainty of the Treatment Effect: A Novel Orthogonal Learner
item.description: New orthogonal learner quantifies treatment effect’s randomness, providing sharper insights beyond average effects.

item.title: Reciprocal Learning
item.description: Numerous machine learning algorithms are unified under the novel paradigm of reciprocal learning, proven to converge at linear rates under specific conditions, enhancing sample efficiency.
